name: Elephant World one Day Tour
description:
The elephants are amazing and such gentle giants! so cute to see baby 
elephants playing with their mums, and to hear them make their trumpet 
sound in real life!
please come here instead of any place where they do trekking! you will 
learn so much and see how happy and free they are :)This is a wonderful experience. You get to feed elephants, help prepare 
their food, watch them, and the best part...bathe with them in the 
river.
